definition[0]: to begin to have a feeling or opinion
example[0]: He came to think of Italy as his home.
example[1]: I came to believe that he was innocent after all.
definition[1]: to do something by chance, without planning or intending to do it
example[2]: Can you tell me how the body came to be discovered?
example[3]: I often wondered how I came to be living in such a place.
